task.title: View and Edit Adjusted Taxes Details
task.shortdesc: View and edit the adjusted current tax amount, as necessary.

step.cmd: From the Process Guided Adjustments page, select the check Document Number link to view the adjustment details.
step.info: The Earnings and Deductions sections are not editable. If an adjustment results in an over or under-withholding of taxes, the Adjustment to Original Net Check (Net Check Adj) miscellaneous deduction is added automatically. This deduction ensures that the net pay of the check does not change.

step.cmd: Select Expand All in the Taxes section to see the original and current tax amounts for each tax. Select Expand Differences to see only tax codes with a difference between the original and the current tax amount.
In the Current Amount fields, adjust the amounts as appropriate.

image.alt: Example of an adjusted check with differences highlighted and the Net Check Adj miscellaneous deduction added

step.stepresult: The Totals section and the Net Check Adj deduction update with the new amounts.
